TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PagedControl extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 以基底類別表示的函式，這些函式會供支援內部分頁的控制項使用。

span.span: Functions as a base class used by controls that support internal pagination.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會公開特定的屬性、 方法和支援內部分頁的所有控制項通用的事件。The class exposes certain properties, methods, and events common to all controls that are capable of internal pagination. 所有控制項都繼承自類別也支援自訂分頁，又稱為區塊處理。All controls that inherit from the class also support custom pagination, known as chunking. 類似於類別，這個類別用於具有長文字的長度，例如控制項， ，或。Similar to the class, this class is used for controls that have long text length, such as a , , or .

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項不是在目前的表單頁面上可見的這個值為-1。If the control is not visible on the current form page, this value is -1.

protected: abstract property int InternalItemCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項中的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the control.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The number of items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自必須覆寫繼承的屬性。Classes that derive from must override this inherited property. 之間的差異屬性和屬性和類別是，如果屬性稱為控制項檢視狀態載入之前，它會在檢視中傳回的項目數狀態，而與不同的行為屬性，它會傳回零。The difference between the property and the property of the and classes is that if the property is called before the control view state is loaded, it returns the number of items in the view state, unlike the behavior of the property, which returns zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ItemCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ItemCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項中的項目計數。

span.span: Gets or sets the count of items in the control.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The count of items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須啟用自訂分頁。Custom pagination must be enabled. 預設值為 0，表示您無法使用自訂分頁。The default is 0, indicating that you cannot use custom paging. 項目所使用的單位取決於控制項。The units used for an item depend on the control. 例如，控制項可能會使用清單項目為單位，而控制項可能會使用字元。For example, a control might use list items as units, whereas a control might use characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ItemsPerPage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ItemsPerPage : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在分頁之後每頁顯示的項目數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of items displayed per page after pagination.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 分頁之後每頁顯示的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items displayed per page after pagination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是零，分頁不是受這個屬性。If zero, pagination is not affected by this property. 如果是非零值，會覆寫表單分頁時，每頁顯示的項目。If nonzero, overrides items displayed per page when the form is paginated. 預設值是零。The default value is zero. 支援內部分頁的行動控制項也會提供一項稱為自訂分頁功能。Mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常，這類控制項要求您提供它們可以顯示的所有資料。Normally, such controls require you to provide all the data that they can display. 開發人員指定的清單中的項目總數屬性。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 屬性會指定多少項目控制項會顯示每個頁面。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用呈現每頁 200 項目清單的八個項目屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property to render eight items of a 200-item list per page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemWeight As Integer
protected: virtual property int ItemWeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項中單一項目的近似權重。

span.span: Gets the approximate weight of a single item in the control.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 控制項中單一項目的近似權重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為-1 表示必須使用項目的預設權重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 繼承的類別必須覆寫這個屬性。The inheriting class must override this property. 如需覆寫這個屬性的進一步資訊，請參閱[分頁支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，並使用自訂清單控制項。The following code example creates and uses a custom list control. 此範例示範如何覆寫屬性類別，以指定新的控制項粗細。The example demonstrates how to override the property of a class to specify a new control weight. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePagedControlSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePagedControlSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobilePagedControlSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePagedControlSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadItems As LoadItemsEventHandler

summary.span: 控制項已自訂分頁且需要更多資料時會發生。

span.span: Occurs when a control is custom-paginated and needs more data.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項已自訂分頁時，您不明確地將控制項繫結。When control is custom-paginated, you do not explicitly bind the control. 分頁之後，控制項就會引發此事件，表示資料的哪個部分為必要。After pagination, the control raises this event, indicating what part of the data is required. 應用程式可以處理這個事件，並繫結的控制項的所需的資料。The application can handle this event and bind the control with the required data. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用呈現每頁 200 項目清單的八個項目屬性。The following example shows how to use the property to render eight items of a 200-item list per page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]
